embed.title: Add color and an icon to your name!
embed.description:
Choose your department to make your name that color, and you'll also get a little icon! This is just for fun, you will not be required to do any work aboard the starship if you choose a department.

You can only be in one department at a time, but you can change it at any time.
embed.footer:
React to the emoji below to add/remove your department and change your name color.
If you already have the role but your react hasn't been added yet, add then remove the reaction to remove the role!
